hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas said:"Allah's Messenger combined the Zuhr and Asr (prayers), and the Maghrib and Isha (prayers) in Al-Madinah, without being in a state of fear, nor due to rain

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْجَمْعِ بَيْنَ الصَّلاَتَيْنِ فِي الْحَضَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Combining Two Prayers While [A Resident]
